content.title: Deploy the Test Plan
content.body:
1. From Project Explorer, expand Test Resources, right-click Jasmine and select Deploy.
  2. In the Iris Preview window, click the Refresh button.
  3. Enter the login credentials:
    • Username: john.doe@woodburn.com
    • Password: VoltMX@123
  4. Click Login.
  5. After a successful login, an alert appears at the bottom of the screen, prompting you to provide access to Iris to your file system.
  6. Click Allow.
    The Save As window appears.
  7. Save the Test result file at a desired location.
    The Test Result file contains details of your test.
